summary: Tested bug fixes and new settings features. All backend endpoints working correctly (13/13 tests passed). Bug fix for athlete-detail render error verified. Settings screen fully functional with all edit capabilities working.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test account coach@test.com for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and verified working. Bug fix for athlete-detail.tsx useFocusEffect issue confirmed - screen loads without navigation errors. Settings screen fully editable with switches, modals, profile edit, and password change all functional.

settings_endpoints.GET /api/settings: ✓ Returns default settings if none exist

password_change.PUT /api/profile/password - success: ✓ Changes password and new password works for login

bug_fix_verification.athlete_detail_navigation: ✓ FIXED - No render error when clicking athlete card from dashboard. Screen loads successfully with athlete info, workouts, and tests tabs.

settings_screen_features.profile_name_edit: ✓ Pencil icon opens edit mode, name input works, save button persists changes
settings_screen_features.notification_switches: ✓ 3 switches present (Notificaciones, Entrenamientos, Tests fisicos) - all toggleable
settings_screen_features.weight_unit_selector: ✓ Opens modal with kg/lb options, selection persists and updates UI
settings_screen_features.height_unit_selector: ✓ Opens modal with cm/ft options, selection persists and updates UI
settings_screen_features.language_toggle: ✓ Toggles between Español/English, UI updates correctly
settings_screen_features.password_change_modal: ✓ Opens with 3 input fields (current, new, confirm), validation works (shows error for mismatched passwords), submission works with valid inputs

mobile_ui_quality.touch_targets: ✓ All buttons and interactive elements properly sized for mobile
mobile_ui_quality.responsive_layout: ✓ Settings screen layout works well on 375x667 viewport
mobile_ui_quality.testID_coverage: ✓ All key elements have testID attributes for testing
